dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, get this, right? I just saw this news, and I'm still reeling. Twenty-four years. Can you, like, believe that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, get this, right? I just saw this news, and I'm still reeling. Twenty-four years. Can you, like, believe that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Former Minister of National Economy Kuandyk Bishimbayev was found guilty of torturing and murdering his wife and was sentenced to 24 years in prison.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, justice, I guess. What's got you so, um, worked up though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, justice, I guess. What's got you so, um, worked up though?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What's got me worked up? His father, Valikhan Bishimbayev, is apparently trying to open a private university. And it's going to be called "Bishimbayev University."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What's got me worked up? His father, Valikhan Bishimbayev, is apparently trying to open a private university. And it's going to be called Bishimbayev University.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Information has appeared online that the father of convicted ex-minister Kuandyk Bishimbayev, Valikhan Bishimbayev, is opening a private university in Taraz under the brand name Bishimbayev University.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, and? It's his family name, isn't it? What's the issue?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, and? It's his family name, isn't it? What's the issue?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The issue? Are you serious? After everything with Saltanat? The whole murder trial, the prison sentence? You think that's, like, an appropriate name?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The issue? Are you serious? After everything with Saltanat? The whole murder trial, the prison sentence? You think that's, like, an appropriate name?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Look, the ministry, uh, responded, right? They said they haven't even applied for a license. It's a procedural thing. Not some moral judgment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Look, the ministry, uh, responded, right? They said they haven't even applied for a license. It's a procedural thing. Not some moral judgment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Science and Higher Education responded to the mailing. ... the ministry excludes the receipt of a license for the educational activities of Bishimbayev University, as well as the absence of an application in the 'e-licensing' information system,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just procedural, B! It's about optics, it's about, you know, basic human decency! Given the context!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just procedural, B! It's about optics, it's about, you know, basic human decency! Given the context!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the father isn't the son. We're not, like, punishing an entire family for one person's crimes, are we?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the father isn't the son. We're not, like, punishing an entire family for one person's crimes, are we?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You don't think "Bishimbayev University" is an incredibly tone-deaf, uh, choice of branding right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You don't think Bishimbayev University is an incredibly tone-deaf, uh, choice of branding right now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's his name. He has a right to use his name, I guess, as long as he follows the rules.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's his name. He has a right to use his name, I guess, as long as he follows the rules.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The rules? The rule is they're not getting a license! It says right here: "Ministry excludes the receipt of a license."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The rules? The rule is they're not getting a license! It says right here: Ministry excludes the receipt of a license.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the ministry excludes the receipt of a license for the educational activities of Bishimbayev University...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, because they didn't, like, submit an application in the e-licensing system. It's not because, um, of his son. It's about paperwork, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, because they didn't, like, submit an application in the e-licensing system. It's not because, um, of his son. It's about paperwork, A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the ministry excludes the receipt of a license for the educational activities of Bishimbayev University, as well as the absence of an application in the 'e-licensing' information system,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No way. You honestly believe that's the only reason? They'd just let him open this university if he filled out the forms correctly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way. You honestly believe that's the only reason? They'd just let him open this university if he filled out the forms correctly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Why wouldn't they? If it meets all the, you know, legal requirements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Why wouldn't they? If it meets all the, you know, legal requirements.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Are you even listening to yourself? This is just... an insult.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Are you even listening to yourself? This is just... an insult.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a private entity. The name is just a name.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a private entity. The name is just a name.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's not just a name anymore. Not after that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's not just a name anymore. Not after that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they won't get a license anyway, right? So, what's the big deal? It's a non-starter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they won't get a license anyway, right? So, what's the big deal? It's a non-starter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the ministry excludes the receipt of a license for the educational activities of Bishimbayev University...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The big deal is they even tried!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The big deal is they even tried!
